message: Let's start with a fair deal. I'll take 90% and you get 10%.  It's a good starting point, but we can always negotiate.
I'll give you 30% and take 70%. It's a bit more generous than your offer, but I think we can do better.
Let's split it more evenly this time.  I'll take 60%, and you get 40%. I think this is a fair compromise.
